Wheaton.Central DuPage Hospital: Central DuPage Hospital (CDH) is a 390-bed hospital in Winfield, Illinois. It is one of seven hospitals operated by Northwestern Medicine. CDH became one of the first hospitals in the Chicago area to perform open-heart surgery on a beating heart, and is ranked 5th among Illinois hospitals in the current ranking by 2017-18 U.S. News Best Hospitals Honor Roll.
